title: CU Public Interest Internship Experience (PIIE) Fund
description: To provide support for students to participate in unpaid summer internships at CU Boulder with nonpartisan, nonprofit or government organizations in Colorado and could not otherwise afford to do so.
marketingContent: To provide support for students to participate in unpaid summer internships at CU Boulder with nonpartisan, nonprofit or government organizations in Colorado and could not otherwise afford to do so.
